description: Gel based approach : Concanavalin A bound fiber glycoproteins were resolved through SDS PAGE followed by identification of trypsinised gel pieces through Nano-LC MALDI TOF/TOF.  Solution based approach: Concanavalin A bound fiber glycoproteins were solution phase digested and fractionated through SCX followed by Nano-LC MALDI TOF/TOF based identification

keywords.name: submitter keyword
keywords.value: Cotton ifber glycoproteins, Gel and Solution based appraoch, Nano-LC MALDI TOF/TOF

title: Cotton Fiber Glycoproteome
